title: Project Scoping - Microsoft 365 Migration
description: A potential client with an on-premise Exchange server wants a quote to migrate their email to Microsoft 365.

tasks.description: Gather key details from the potential client, such as the number of mailboxes, total data size, and current Exchange version.
tasks.expected_outcome: The sales engineer has all the necessary information to scope the project.

tasks.description: Use the gathered details to estimate the total number of hours required for the migration project.
tasks.expected_outcome: A realistic effort estimate is created.

tasks.description: Create a formal quote and Statement of Work (SOW) detailing the project scope, timeline, and cost.
tasks.expected_outcome: A professional and accurate quote is provided to the potential client.
